Name: Market Boom
Text: Stocks surge to record highs as investors celebrate unprecedented gains.

Name: Market Crash
Text: Panic ensues as stock prices plummet, wiping out trillions in market value.

Name: Railway Mania
Text: Investors caught up in the excitement of the railway boom, driving up stock prices to dizzying heights.

Name: Economic Downturn
Text: Economic woes sweep through the city, leading to a market downturn and financial hardship.

Name: Colonial Discovery
Text: Reports of a prosperous colony spark investment fever, fueling hopes of great returns.

Name: Industrial Innovation
Text: A wave of new inventions and industrial breakthroughs revitalizes the market and boosts investor confidence.

Name: Banking Panic
Text: A series of bank failures triggers widespread panic among investors and depositors.

Name: Opium Crisis
Text: Trade imbalances and Opium Wars contribute to a financial crisis with repercussions in global markets.

Name: Potato Blight
Text: The Potato Famine disrupts agricultural markets and leads to economic repercussions throughout the empire.

Name: Railway Debacle
Text: Speculative investments in poorly planned railway projects result in financial ruin for many investors.

Name: Tariff Troubles
Text: Tariff disputes and changes in import policies create uncertainty and negatively impact investments.

Name: Factory Fires
Text: A series of devastating fires in numerous factories causes significant losses for investors and insurers.

Name: Currency Devaluation
Text: Government decisions lead to currency devaluation, causing turmoil in financial markets and trade.
